Message: Hey Mom, can we make some cookies together later? I really liked the last ones we made, and I want to try adding chocolate chips this time!

Absolutely, sweetheart! I love that burst of color and the extra sweetness the M&Ms will add. Just focus on your homework, and once you're done, we'll get straight to making those fun and yummy cookies together. It's going to be such a good time!
